alert.note: Alert for Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 06 at 3:33PM EDT until August 06 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL WOODFORD COUNTY... At 333 PM EDT, while the heavy rainfall threat has ended, emergency management has reported several closed roads throughout the county. Between 2.5 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Versailles, Milner, Bonita, Mortonsville, Firmantown, Gaybourn and Pisgah. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
